title: desktop folder
extract: files vs. folders - Computer Definition. A file is the common storage unit in a computer. ... Folders are also called "directories," and they are created on the hard disk when the operating system and applications are installed. For example, the user's desktop is actually a folder.
extract_html: files vs. folders - Computer Definition. A file is the common storage unit in a computer. ... Folders are also called "directories," and they are created on the hard disk when the operating system and applications are installed. For example, the user's desktop is actually a folder.
